TopicTitle: OSE Workshop and Global Construction Module Editing

Articles.Content:
Hello,

in my current game, I made a vessel with a workshop from the mod OSE Workshop which I attempted to use with the Global Construction mod.

As GC showed "no Workshop" in the ingame menu, I looked into the files of both mods.

In the part file "Orbital Workshop" of the GC mod, if found a module called "SingleVesselConstructionWorkshop".

In the part file "OSE_Workshop", I added the same lines to make the workshop usable with the GC mod.

Ingame, I loaded up the craft, but GC still wasn't showing a usable workshop.

Would be great if someone could give me some tips!

Have a nice day!
